title: Fiora's  "W" Parry cancels ignites why?
body: Just wondering why Riot decide to make parry completely blocking the full duration of ignite? the spell lasts for 5 seconds when parry is only 0.75? his seems very bullshitt by riot as nothing can fully remove ignite but clense? lol its weird that such a champion is able to do that, because kayles ult, hourglass, bards ult all ONLY block dmg for the duration of the statis effect but fioras pparry actually removes ignite? is this a bug cos it seems like quite an unfair advantage, cos so far only clense can do tht and nothing else but fioras w so I don't get why riot has done this.

replies.body: Her ult before made her untarget-able and invulnerable, since they reworked the Ult, it's only fair that she should keep the invici stats somewhere else. W is her only defensive ability, if she loses that then she's very very vulnerable.
Parry should not deal damage if it doesn't PARRY anything. She has a long range poke now, and that sucks.

She does not have long range poke at all, it takes .75 seconds to ramp up to cast, and it hardly deals any damage, also if you're up against a Fiora poking you with her W... you should definitely win lane, that's her only defensive ability and it is on a VERY long CD, once it's down, dive her and she can't do squat
Her parry can parry exhaust too if I'm right
I don't think it blocks exhaust

your all so dum so what she can parry ignite talk about how she can parry every ult in the game well not all but any that is a targeted ult she can so what I don't care if she can stop my ignite how about wen she on 100 hp and w my jinx ult or my darius ult its bs

she can parry ignite if you cast it on her while shes in parry 
she can parry alot of things the most annoying being zeds ultimate 
nows that bullshit

She can parry Karthus' ultimate as well. So annoying, played an ARAM and never once could kill her cause she would just wait a bit and then parry it..
How the hell do you parry a death beam from the sky!?
it should only block 1 tick of ignite only imo
its counted as a debuff, so if cast on her when she uses w is won't work and will go on cd, if she uses w under the effects it will block the damage, her w blocks ALL DAMAGE including true
